name: Mini Putt Mania
description:
Become a mini putt master by trying Mini Putt Mania now! This mobile take on the classic putting game is sure to delight!

- Control your shot's strength
- Putt the ball between obstacles
- Meet par to complete levels
- Tons of mini put course variations to experience

Start putting in Mini Putt Mania today, the hottest mini putt game of the month!
